message.body: Hey there! Do you have plans for New Years? :)
Nope :) but I'd rather not go into the city, would prefer something more low key.
Mmkay. My girlfriend is coming up here between Christmas and New Years and she's never been to first night before so we are doing that. We could come back to town before midnight though
also Leah is having a gathering at her house
Cool. But I don't want to invite myself over to Leah's...
Leah said to feel free to extend the invitation to anyone she missed in the email :P anyway we can figure out details later I was just wondering.
Great! I'll talk to you later.
